overview: Misha, Adam, Syawal and Tania run a homestay from the bungalow left to Syawal by his late father on Pulau Carey. Syawal and Tania are in hiding from some city gangsters that Syawal has crossed but when dead bodies of their guests begin to turn up every day, keeping low from the gangsters become the least of their problems.
title: Sumpahan Malam Raya
